text: Þis his þare XX hida land boc æt stantune þe Eadgar cyng gebocode Osulfe byscope on ehce yrfe.
Þis synt þa landgemære to stantune.
Ærest of holan wylle on þa ruwan hola þonne on þone ealdan weg up to þam hæþenan byrgelse.
Þonon on þryfyld dene of þære dene on þone scearpan stan.
Of þan stane on ane hlinc ræwe oþ hit cymð to blacan grafum þonon on þone mær stan.
Of þam stane on ða foxholu.
Þonne on þane stanigan beorh on þorndune norþewearde of þam beorge on þa stanas andlang dene neoðewearde of þam on anne stan.
Þonon on þa ealdan burh middewearde.
Of þære ealdan on oxna mere þonon on anne crundel lið an stan ond of þam stane on þone midmestan hrycg on east cumbum.
Þonne on east mores heafod to þam hæþenan byrgelse on brom lace þonne andlang streames eft on holan wylle.
Þis his þa landes boc æt stantune.
